name: Oddy
subtitle: Clocksmith of Eternal Life
description: A clocksmith that was cursed by the divine animals called the Redpur. His magical clock attacks and petrifies enemies and also allows his allies to use abilites faster.
story: He was a mechanic of the royal palace of Orvelia in the distant past. However, he was cursed by the mythical creature Redpur and turned into a Redpur himself. Ever since the transformation, he has been living for so long that he forgot his own age. When he was Human, he invented the first portable watch, but no one in Orvelia saw its true value. To give his invention the recognition it deserved, he set out to the empire. On his way, he was cursed by a group of Redpurs who mistook him for a poacher. The curse also affected his watch, giving it a magical power to control the time flow within a living body. Oddy's own time stopped as well.

talk: Hmm, there's enough time. Shall we talk for a bit?
I used to be a human once...but now I'm a Redpur.
My watch is enchanted with magic. The magic of the Redpur...
recruit.gift: Oho~it's been a while since I received such human-like presents!

talk: You don't have time? Ha ha, then just make time.
You've never seen a Redpur before? Not surprised. They're always hiding!
affinity.gift: A gift? Hm, I'll have to prepare something next time.

talk: Ah, I miss my Redpur friends...
I don't really remember my days as a human. It has been so long.
I thought I was the first to invent the pocket watch, but apparently ancient civilizations were far more advanced than I expected.

uw.story: After Oddy's watch was zapped with the Redpur curse and gained the power to control time over a living being, he used the infinite time he gained to research its possible applications. When he finally created a watch containing the essence of time magic after so many trials, Oddy found out that the secret of Redpur magic originated from moonlight and the shadow it creates. He named his masterpiece 'Tempodiana,' and gave it the nickname 'Moonshade Countdown.'

ut.story: A device that adjusts the cracks of time. Time manipulation can create cracks in time, and strong energy gathers inside them. Those incapable of controlling the cracks can get stuck and forced to spend eternity in them. However, Oddy, a veteran time sorcerer, crafted this exquisite orb to tweak the cracks of time and used the energy to maximize the performance of Tempodiana.

ut.story: Fur of the Red Fur chief hung in the shadow of the moon. It is said that the mythical creature, the Red Fur Chief, uses the shadow of the moon during full moon to go through dimensions and dance. The Red Fur Chief dances until the shadow of the moon disappears, and it is said that his tail sometimes gets stuck in the pathway. The fur of the colorful mythical creature gets stuck in the rift of time and space and stops time temporarily. Oddy uses the fur from the traces of the shadows of the moon to make a skein and uses it effectively for Time Distortion.
